mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_grading (id, code, name, another_name, status, province, city, district, cbd, estate_type, estate_addr, position_describe1, position_describe2, room_drawing, map_drawing, create_time, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anotherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{district,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cbd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{estateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{estateAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionDescribe1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionDescribe2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomDrawing,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mapDrawing,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_grading set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, another_name = #{anotherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, district = #{district,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cbd = #{cbd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, estate_type = #{estateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, estate_addr = #{estateAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position_describe1 = #{positionDescribe1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position_describe2 = #{positionDescribe2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_drawing = #{roomDrawing,jdbcType=BIGINT}, map_drawing = #{mapDrawing,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select t.id as t_id, t.code as t_code, t.name as t_name, t.another_name as t_another_name, t.status as t_status, t.province as t_province, t.city as t_city, t.district as t_district, t.cbd as t_cbd, t.estate_type as t_estate_type, t.estate_addr as t_estate_addr, t.position_describe1 as t_position_describe1, t.position_describe2 as t_position_describe2, t.room_drawing as t_room_drawing, t.map_drawing as t_map_drawing, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.modify_time as t_modify_time from t_grading t where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select t.id as t_id, t.code as t_code, t.name as t_name, t.another_name as t_another_name, t.status as t_status, t.province as t_province, t.city as t_city, t.district as t_district, t.cbd as t_cbd, t.estate_type as t_estate_type, t.estate_addr as t_estate_addr, t.position_describe1 as t_position_describe1, t.position_describe2 as t_position_describe2, t.room_drawing as t_room_drawing, t.map_drawing as t_map_drawing, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.modify_time as t_modify_time from t_grading t

select t.id as t_id, t.code as t_code, t.name as t_name, t.another_name as t_another_name, t.status as t_status, t.province as t_province, t.city as t_city, t.district as t_district, t.cbd as t_cbd, t.estate_type as t_estate_type, t.estate_addr as t_estate_addr, t.position_describe1 as t_position_describe1, t.position_describe2 as t_position_describe2, t.room_drawing as t_room_drawing, t.map_drawing as t_map_drawing, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.modify_time as t_modify_time from t_grading t

select t.id as t_id, t.code as t_code, t.name as t_name, t.another_name as t_another_name, t.status as t_status, t.province as t_province, t.city as t_city, t.district as t_district, t.cbd as t_cbd, t.estate_type as t_estate_type, t.estate_addr as t_estate_addr, t.position_describe1 as t_position_describe1, t.position_describe2 as t_position_describe2, t.room_drawing as t_room_drawing, t.map_drawing as t_map_drawing, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.modify_time as t_modify_time from t_grading t
select count(1) as totalNum ,sum(t.room_drawing as t_room_drawing) ,sum(t.map_drawing as t_map_drawing) from t_grading t
mapper.insert: insert into t_grading (id, code, name, another_name, status, province, city, district, cbd, estate_type, estate_addr, position_describe1, position_describe2, room_drawing, map_drawing, create_time, modify_time ) values #{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.anotherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.district,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.cbd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.estateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.estateAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.positionDescribe1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.positionDescribe2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roomDrawing,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.mapDrawing,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
